messages.subject: Quilts and Apples
messages.msgSnippet: I just wanted to say that I totally agree.  Who needs preschool?  I used to volunteer at a church-sponsored preschool and their most frequent complaint was why
messages.messageBody:
I just wanted to say that I totally agree. Who needs preschool? I used to volunteer at a church-sponsored preschool and their most frequent complaint was why weren't the parents teaching them the alphabet, time, numbers, etc. The teachers couldn't teach them those things in the time they had with them in a group setting. In reality, it was child care with a thin layer of educational content.


From: starsuncloud@...
Subject: Quilts and apples
Anyway, I just thought it was really cool to see the 2.5 y.o. connections
being made tonight. And he said "Appo" when I pulled the apple from the fridge
instead of the usual "tthhhh".:) Quilts and apples......who needs preschool?


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
